channel.title: Shoe Care on Alex's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Shoe Care on Alex's Blog

item.title: Shoe Care Without Being a Nerd
item.description: Inspired by How to Love Cast Iron Without Being a Nerd About It by Internet Shaquille . Shoe care can seem really daunting and difficult. You’ve heard all about this “Goodyear Welt” thing and finally sent it and spent more on a pair of shoes than you thought was humanly possible. They’re supposed to last, but what do you need to do to get the best life out of them?
